00210 
00211   // Returns the languages string used in the last valid initialization.
00212   // If the last initialization specified "deu+hin" then that will be
00213   // returned. If hin loaded eng automatically as well, then that will
00214   // not be included in this list. To find the languages actually
00215   // loaded use GetLoadedLanguagesAsVector.
00216   // The returned string should NOT be deleted.
00217   const char* GetInitLanguagesAsString() const;
00218 
00219   // Returns the loaded languages in the vector of STRINGs.
00220   // Includes all languages loaded by the last Init, including those loaded
00221   // as dependencies of other loaded languages.
00222   void GetLoadedLanguagesAsVector(GenericVector<STRING>* langs) const;

00382   // Gets the individual connected (text) components (created
00383   // after pages segmentation step, but before recognition)
00384   // as a leptonica-style Boxa, Pixa pair, in reading order.
00385   // Can be called before or after Recognize.
00386   // Note: the caller is responsible for calling boxaDestroy()
00387   // on the returned Boxa array and pixaDestroy() on cc array.
00388   Boxa* GetConnectedComponents(Pixa** cc);
00389 
00390   // Get the given level kind of components (block, textline, word etc.) as a
00391   // leptonica-style Boxa, Pixa pair, in reading order.
00392   // Can be called before or after Recognize.
00393   // If blockids is not NULL, the block-id of each component is also returned
00394   // as an array of one element per component. delete [] after use.
00395   // If text_only is true, then only text components are returned.
00396   Boxa* GetComponentImages(PageIteratorLevel level,
00397                            bool text_only,
00398                            Pixa** pixa, int** blockids);
00399 
00400   // Returns the scale factor of the thresholded image that would be returned by
00401   // GetThresholdedImage() and the various GetX() methods that call
00402   // GetComponentImages().
00403   // Returns 0 if no thresholder has been set.
00404   int GetThresholdedImageScaleFactor() const;

00413   // Runs page layout analysis in the mode set by SetPageSegMode.
00414   // May optionally be called prior to Recognize to get access to just
00415   // the page layout results. Returns an iterator to the results.
00416   // Returns NULL on error.
00417   // The returned iterator must be deleted after use.
00418   // WARNING! This class points to data held within the TessBaseAPI class, and
00419   // therefore can only be used while the TessBaseAPI class still exists and
00420   // has not been subjected to a call of Init, SetImage, Recognize, Clear, End
00421   // DetectOS, or anything else that changes the internal PAGE_RES.
00422   PageIterator* AnalyseLayout();

00475   // Get a reading-order iterator to the results of LayoutAnalysis and/or
00476   // Recognize. The returned iterator must be deleted after use.
00477   // WARNING! This class points to data held within the TessBaseAPI class, and
00478   // therefore can only be used while the TessBaseAPI class still exists and
00479   // has not been subjected to a call of Init, SetImage, Recognize, Clear, End
00480   // DetectOS, or anything else that changes the internal PAGE_RES.
